## Description {#details}

Diagnostic information for inline asm reporting.

This is basically a message and an optional location.

Definition at line 169 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### DiagnosticInfoInlineAsm() {#a8fce7ac4196df7aa86af3d4f1318e333}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DiagnosticInfoInlineAsm::DiagnosticInfoInlineAsm (uint64&#95;t LocCookie, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; MsgStr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5c">DiagnosticSeverity</a> Severity=<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5caa73815097c71f15fe54ab447a7ff00ba">DS&#95;Error</a>)</>}>
<code>LocCookie</code> if non-zero gives the line number for this report.

<code>MsgStr</code> gives the message. This class does not copy <code>MsgStr</code>, therefore the reference must be valid for the whole life time of the Diagnostic.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00183">183</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp">DiagnosticInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DiagnosticInfoInlineAsm() {#ae5ed844b0ad5afc241dde1c07c0d8edc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DiagnosticInfoInlineAsm::DiagnosticInfoInlineAsm (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; MsgStr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5c">DiagnosticSeverity</a> Severity=<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5caa73815097c71f15fe54ab447a7ff00ba">DS&#95;Error</a>)</>}>
<code>Instr</code> gives the original instruction that triggered the diagnostic.

<code>MsgStr</code> gives the message. This class does not copy <code>MsgStr</code>, therefore the reference must be valid for the whole life time of the Diagnostic. Same for <code>I</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00191">191</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnosticinfo-cpp">DiagnosticInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
